about_the_game:
background introduction：

The destitute knight, White Cat, decides to form an adventure group, and all the future is unknown. The story begins from here.

Game content：

The encounter mode of this game adopts the Random Encount System, which slightly modifies the character mechanism compared to the traditional turn based system, abandons annoying puzzles, and focuses on resource management and exploration treasure hunting as the main axis, embarking on adventures in the vast world. Players need to use their held money wisely, prepare keys and supplies to explore and acquire new items and skills everywhere. Do you want to experience less combat and earn more money? Do you want to temporarily avoid enemies when resources are sufficient? You have just obtained some rare item, but the HP of the team has already reached its bottom. Do you want to return to the city immediately?Don't worry, businessmen have their own answers.

Game features：

  • The unique 'counting' system brings complex and diverse skill select and tactical combinations

  • Rich exploratory elements,the more you explore, the stronger your character will become and the more skill combinations they will have to defeat enemies

  • A relaxed and enjoyable plot atmosphere

  • Each map scene has its own characteristics

  • Using a single city as a base

  • The exploration sequence of the map is not strictly limited,paired with various exploration content to provide each player with a unique experience

  • More than 10 hours of game time
